backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for BioMentor AI backend, defining student profile management, trial/subscription logic, conversation history, document metadata, and practice records with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the Live Voice Chat audit/fix task to its affected files (VoiceChatInterface, useVoiceChat, bioAI, AITutor) and associated components/test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to one-line summaries describing each file's purpose and notable recent changes (e.g., Tailwind fixes, hook rewrites, API restorations).
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme tokens (colors, sidebar, charts, radius) used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the BioMentor AI React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app file that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes, an auth/trial guard in RootLayout, and an IndexPage component that conditionally renders the landing page or dashboard based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Persistent sidebar layout component with responsive navigation, user avatar, login button, and a mobile overlay, rendering nav items only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity, handling authentication state transitions and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's name and email, saves their profile, and starts a free trial using mutation hooks. Blocks interaction outside the modal until submission completes.
frontend/src/components/TrialExpiredModa: A non-dismissible modal displayed when a user's free trial has expired, listing premium features and showing an upgrade CTA at â‚¹499/month.
frontend/src/components/VoiceChatInterfa: A voice chat UI component that displays a transcript of user/AI turns, animated waveform bars, and session controls (start, stop, interrupt) using the useVoiceChat hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, using the current Internet Identity for authenticated calls and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, trial status checks, conversation history management, and study materials operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceChat.ts: A React hook that manages a voice chat session using the Web Speech API, handling states (idle, listening, thinking, speaking), speech recognition, text-to-speech synthesis, and a transcript of conversation turns.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Sora fonts, configures Tailwind CSS with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, and defines utility classes and animations for chat bubbles and voice bars.
frontend/src/lib/bioAI.ts: Client-side biology AI tutor logic that provides keyword-matched topic responses, generates exam questions, notes, adaptive practice questions, and mentorship content entirely without a backend API.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdaptiveLearning.tsx: A page that displays weak topics, a revision plan, and an interactive adaptive practice quiz session, tracking and persisting practice records via backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AITutor.tsx: A page component offering both text and voice chat interfaces with the biology AI tutor, saving conversation turns to the backend via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: The main dashboard page showing a welcome header, subscription/trial status, performance stats, weak topics, recent study materials, and navigation cards to all major features.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentUpload.tsx: Page for uploading biology documents (PDF/PPT) that displays uploaded documents as cards with mock AI analysis (mechanisms, exam highlights, pathways) and supports delete/expand actions using study material hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ExamQuestions.tsx: Page that lets users select a biology topic and question type, then generates university-format exam questions (2-mark to 10-mark, MCQ, etc.) with toggleable model answers using the bioAI library.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page for BioMentor AI showcasing six feature cards and a hero section with an Internet Identity login button that initiates the authentication flow.
frontend/src/pages/Mentorship.tsx: Mentorship page with four selectable categories (textbooks, study strategy, exam prep, career guidance) that renders static markdown-like content from the bioAI library using a custom ContentRenderer component.
frontend/src/pages/NotesGenerator.tsx: Page where users enter a biology topic and optional content to generate a NoteSet (detailed notes, revision, bullets, mechanisms, definitions) displayed across tabs with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including fonts, OKLCH-based color palettes (teal, amber, semantic tokens), border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes, with typography and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing an AI-powered biology tutoring web platform, tracking versioned feature implementations, architectural notes, and known issues for build planning.
